name: JavaToolInstaller
description: Acquires Java from Azure Blob storage, a file share, or the tools cache and sets JAVA_HOME for it to be used in subsequent tasks.
author: Microsoft Corporation

groups.name: JavaInAzureGroup
groups.displayName: Download Java from Azure Blob storage

inputs.name: javaVersion
inputs.label: Java version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the Java version to make available and add to the tools cache.

inputs.name: javaArchitectureOption
inputs.label: Java architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the Java architecture to make available and add to the tools cache.

inputs.name: javaArchiveLocationOption
inputs.label: Java archive file location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the location option for the Java archive file.

inputs.name: javaArchiveFilePath
inputs.label: Java archive file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the path to the Java archive file. The path can be relative to the source code repository or use a local path or file share.

inputs.name: azureResourceManagerEndpoint
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the Azure Resource Manager subscription in which the Java archive file is stored.

inputs.name: azureStorageAccountName
inputs.label: Storage account Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the storage account that contains the Java archive file.

inputs.name: azureContainerName
inputs.label: Container name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the name of the container in the Azure storage account that contains the Java archive file.

inputs.name: azureCommonVirtualFilePath
inputs.label: Common virtual file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the path to the Java archive file relative to the root of the Azure storage container.

inputs.name: javaDestinationDirectory
inputs.label: Local destination directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the local directory into which the Java archive file should be extracted.

inputs.name: cleanDestinationDirectory
inputs.label: Clean destination directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to clean the destination directory before the Java archive file is extracted into it.
